biotools.summary: SCLC CellMiner Cross Database (SclcCellMinerCDB) allows translational researchers to conduct analyses across all major SCLC cancer cell line pharmacogenomic data sources from NCI, Sanger GDSC, and Broad CCLE/CTRP.
